3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have clear height and thickness. Floors are distinct. Interior volume is well perceivable. Proper 3D corner geometry. Angled view is good with interior visible from elevated perspective. Minimal perspective distortion. Roof/ceiling is cleanly removed, and interior spaces are fully visible. Geometry is clean except for what appears to be a missing wall section next to the entrance door.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Correct number of rooms and adjacency relationships are maintained. Relative room proportions are well-preserved. Major wall positions align well, and wall lengths are proportional. Internal partitions are mostly correct, though there's a missing wall by the entrance. All major doors are present and on correct walls. Windows are present and on correct walls, though some are generalized. Openings are proportionally sized but some window styles vary.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture (beds, sofas, tables), kitchen elements, and bathroom fixtures are all present. Furniture is placed in correct rooms, and scale is reasonable. Orientation is logical.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable. Geometry is readable and not confusing. Interior is clearly visible and lighting does not obscure geometry. Material usage is consistent. No major rendering artifacts. Clean presentation with a simple background.

detected_errors.description: Missing wall section adjacent to the main entrance door, which was present in the 2D floor plan, suggesting a deviation in major wall geometry.

summary: This is an excellent and geometrically faithful 3D transformation with nearly perfect preservation of the 2D floor plan's layout and content, with one minor wall discrepancy.
